title: Поехали с нами!
overview: Famous families with children will go on a weekend trip to the cities of Russia and the CIS. In the company of their closest ones, they will discover Baku, Sochi, Stavropol Territory, Dagestan, Minsk, Tashkent, Kazan, Nizhny Novgorod and other places with a budget of 25,000 rubles. This amount should include accommodation, meals, movement around the city, entertainment for adults and children, souvenirs. The stars will tell in detail about life hacks that will help the whole family have a cool and budget vacation – the audience will find a colorful guide that will save them from reading reviews and long searches.
